meanings.definition: Covered in or having many pimples or blemishes
meanings.sent1: Her face looked zitty with all the red bumps.
meanings.sent2: The teenager's skin was zitty due to the acne breakout.
meanings.sent3: The pizza was so greasy that it looked zitty with oil spots.
meanings.sent4: The night sky was zitty with stars, twinkling brightly.
meanings.sent5: The muddy field was zitty with footprints after the rain.

meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a pimple or blemish
meanings.sent1: The small bump on the fruit was zitty and unappealing.
meanings.sent2: The rough texture of the fabric felt zitty against her skin.
meanings.sent3: The old painting had a zitty appearance with its cracked surface.
meanings.sent4: The bumpy road was zitty under the wheels of the car.
meanings.sent5: The uneven frosting on the cake made it look zitty and uneven.
